post.image_prompt: Close-up product shot of the new Fenty Beauty Diamond Bomb All-Over Diamond Veil in "Cognac Candy". The product is displayed in its signature compact, showcasing the shimmering bronze shade. The compact is resting on a textured, warm-toned surface, possibly a velvet or suede material in a similar bronze or caramel color. The composition is clean and focuses entirely on the product, with a shallow depth of field to blur the background slightly. The overall mood is luxurious, glamorous, and inviting. The image should have a warm, golden color palette with a focus on bronze and caramel tones. The style is high-end beauty photography, emphasizing the product's quality and appeal.
